title: (x) Oprah website - Engravers Gothic {Mike Y}
content:
The Oprah [banner](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111031446/http:/www.oprah.com/) looks like [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111031446/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/).   
   
You ought to register Chris, if you plan to come here often, but welcome.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: Yes, that should be equivalent. Agfa (before merging with Monotype) had their own versions of many popular pre-digital typefaces. The Bitstream Engravers Gothic is their version of the same type.
